name: Pacemaker (maxtrautwein)
description:
Pacemaker is a platformer where time is the life's currency. You and the enemies have a certain amount of time : no time = death. Across a procedural generated map you can steal time from the enemies but they can also steal your.    

Find the gate before your time is over! 

Arrows to move     

Space to attack or to interact  

#ludumdare44
